message: Missing pagination support in list endpoints
details: API endpoints like listWorkflows return paginated responses, but the MCP tools do not expose 'cursor' or 'limit' parameters, limiting access to the first page of results.

The 'n8n_execute_workflow' tool relies on a standard webhook URL pattern (/webhook/:id). This will fail if the workflow uses a custom slug or doesn't have a webhook node. This is a known limitation but should be documented or improved if possible.
Workflow nodes and connections use 'any' type. While understandable due to n8n's dynamic nature, strict typing would be better if the schema was stable.
The implementation assumes the API expects an array of objects `{id: string}`, which needs verification against n8n API behavior.
